Fields

Exited = 4

This thread has permanently exited.

NotStarted = 0

This thread has not yet been started.

Paused = 3

This thread is paused to be moved to a different native thread. This occurs when ExecutionMode changes.

Running = 2

This thread is running.

Starting = 1

This thread is preparing to run.
